background.name: neovim
commands: bash -c "for i in $(ls ${XDG_RUNTIME_DIR}/nvim.*.0); do nvim --server $i --remote-send ':set background=%background%<CR>'; done"

theme.name: neovim
commands: bash -c "for i in $(ls ${XDG_RUNTIME_DIR}/nvim.*.0); do nvim --server $i --remote-send ':colorscheme %theme%<CR>'; done"
